report_title: KJET Mombasa County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Strong track record with consistent employment growth (12 to 20) and multiple pre-qualifications with major institutions (KPA, KenGen, KPLC).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: High and stable Net Profit margin (30%) on growing turnover (3.5M to 5.08M) demonstrates financial health and viability.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: High B2B sales (70%) to public and private institutions; competitive edge through bundled services and strong pre-qualification status.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strategic proposal: investment in equipment (truck, tools) and digital adoption directly addresses core capacity constraints and inefficiency.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Strong alignment with the priority Construction VC. Role is direct construction/renovation and materials supply.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Good environmental practices (eco-friendly cleaning, waste separation, water conservation) but lacks strong woman-owned status.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Strong turnover growth (1M to 3.2M) and is woman-led, but overall scale is moderate.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Excellent revenue growth (tripled) with consistent, high profitability (25% margin).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Strong product differentiation (natural, preservative-free) giving a competitive edge against large brands in niche health markets.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear, SMART goals (60% capacity increase, KEBS certification) and investment in commercial-grade processing equipment is appropriate.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Excellent alignment with priority Edible Oils VC. Deep value addition (extraction, blending) and strong backward linkage to smallholder farmers.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High inclusivity (Woman-led, 70% women/youth) with sustainability focus on organic practices and implementing environmental standards.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Stable track record but operates at a small scale (5 employees, 1M turnover).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Stable, positive financial performance with consistent profit (20% margin), but low magnitude and growth.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: High B2B sales (80%) to schools, indicating reliable contract-based market access.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Investment in core machinery is appropriate, but the proposal's objectives are vague (increase market share).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Strong alignment with priority Textiles VC with deep value addition (clothing production).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-Owned. Sustainability practice of recycling fabric cutoffs into other products (furniture stuffing).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Small scale, but good membership growth (15 to 30) in a specialized sector.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Excellent revenue growth in 2024 (70K to 1M turnover) but low profit margin (7%) limits score.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Balanced market (25% B2B, 75% B2C) with a clear focus on sustainability and traceability as a USP.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Investment in processing (freezing/cleaning) and catering equipment directly supports the dual-business growth strategy.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Excellent alignment with additional VC: Blue Economy (seafood production). Deep value addition via processing and catering.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Good inclusivity (40% women-owned/workforce, female CFO) and clear sustainable sourcing practices.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Very low scale in turnover (400K) and employees (4), indicating a nascent enterprise.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Very low financial magnitude and slow growth (400K turnover, 20K profit).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: High B2B sales (80%) to schools, suggesting strong contract potential despite small size.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Proposal is generic, focused on equipment and basic training needs.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Strong alignment with priority Textiles VC with core clothing production.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-Owned. Sustainability practice of recycling fabric cutoffs into other products.
